title: Extent :- These Regulations shall apply to the area earmarked as Conservation Zone, more specifically shown in green verge on the maps appended herewith as Appendix - ―M‖ and illustratively listed in the Appendix - ―N‖
clause_text: Extent :- These Regulations shall apply to the area earmarked as Conservation Zone, more specifically shown in green verge on the maps appended herewith as Appendix - ―M‖ and illustratively listed in the Appendix - ―N‖. Commencement :- These Regulations will come into force after it is sanctioned by Government.
section: (1) 5.5.2 (1) Regulations Conservation Zone in Satara Region.
